content:
I've got the pricing and intro offer details for Sahara Yoga Studio and Urban Yoga Loft:

**Sahara Yoga Studio**

* **Intro Offer:** $29 for 1 week of unlimited classes (new students only)
* **Drop-in Rate:** $18 per class
* **Class Packages:**
	+ 5-class package: $80 (valid for 2 months)
	+ 10-class package: $150 (valid for 4 months)
	+ Monthly membership: $120 (auto-renewing, with a 30-day notice for cancellation)
* **Discounts:**
	+ Student/Senior discount: 10% off all packages and memberships
	+ Military/First Responder discount: 20% off all packages and memberships

**Urban Yoga Loft**

* **Intro Offer:** $39 for 2 weeks of unlimited classes (new students only)
* **Drop-in Rate:** $20 per class
* **Class Packages:**
	+ 5-class package: $90 (valid for 2 months)
	+ 10-class package: $170 (valid for 4 months)
	+ Monthly membership: $140 (auto-renewing, with a 30-day notice for cancellation)
* **Discounts:**
	+ Student/Senior discount: 10% off all packages and memberships
	+ Corporate discount: 15% off all packages and memberships for employees of partner companies

Both studios offer competitive pricing, and their intro offers are a great way to try out their classes and get a feel for the studio. If you're on a tight budget, Sahara Yoga Studio's intro offer might be a better fit, as it's a bit more affordable.

Keep in mind that these prices are subject to change, so it's always a good idea to check the studios' websites or contact them directly to confirm pricing and any promotions.

Remember, investing in your yoga practice can have a positive impact on your physical and mental well-being, and it's worth exploring options that fit your budget.
